Package rt

Interface Summary
Camera Given the specification of a ray in image space, a camera constructs a corresponding ray in world space.
Film A film stores a 2D grid of Spectrum representing an image.
Integrator An integrator takes a ray starting at the camera and evaluates its contribution to the image.
IntegratorFactory Makes an Integrator.
Intersectable Interface to be implemented by any class supporting ray-surface intersection.
LightSource Interface for light sources.
Material Materials implement functionality for shading surfaces using their BRDFs.
Sampler Makes random samples, which are used for Monte Carlo rendering.
SamplerFactory Makes a Sampler.
Tonemapper Compresses a raw rendered Film to an image that can be displayed on typical 8-bit displays.
 

Class Summary
BoxFilterFilm Uses a box filter when accumulating samples on a film.
ClampTonemapper Tone maps a film by clamping all color channels to range [0,1].
CSGCube A cube implemented using planes and CSG.
CSGDodecahedron A dodecahedron implemented using planes and CSG.
CSGNode A CSG node combines two CSG solids using a set operation, such as intersection, addition, or subtraction.
CSGPlane A plane for CSG operations.
CSGSolid A CSG solid object that can be intersected by a ray.
DebugIntegrator Use this integrator for debugging purposes.
DebugIntegratorFactory Makes a DebugIntegrator.
DiffuseMaterial A basic diffuse material.
DummyCamera A camera whose rays have x- and y- coordinates in the direction vector in the range [0,1] over the image plane.
FixedCamera A simple camera with fixed position and view frustum.
HitRecord Stores information about a ray-surface intersection.
LightList A list of light sources.
LightSource.LightGeometry  
Main The main rendering loop.
Main.Counter  
Main.RenderTask A render task represents a rectangular image region that is rendered by a thread in one chunk.
Main.RenderThread  
MandelbrotIntegrator An educational integrator to demonstrate the rt framework.
MandelbrotIntegratorFactory Makes integrators of type MandelbrotIntegrator.
OneSampler Returns always one sample at 0.5 in all dimensions.
OneSamplerFactory Makes a OneSampler.
PinholeCamera  
PointLight A point light source.
RandomSampler Makes uniform random samples in the range [0,1].
RandomSamplerFactory Makes a RandomSampler.
Ray A ray represented by an origin and a direction.
Scene Defines scene properties that need to be made accessible to the renderer.
Spectrum Stores a spectrum of color values.
Timer A utility class to help us run benchmarks.
WhittedIntegrator Integrator for Whitted style ray tracing.
WhittedIntegratorFactory Makes a WhittedIntegrator.
 

Enum Summary
CSGNode.OperationType  
CSGSolid.BelongsTo
